```{r}
# read the real data on July 1 for test
df <- read.csv("Tetuan City power consumption.csv")
colnames(df)
```



```{r}
colnames(df)[7] <- "Zone1"
colnames(df)[8] <- "Zone2"
colnames(df)[9] <- "Zone3"
```


```{r}
date <- seq(from=as.POSIXct("2017-01-01 00:00", format = "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M"), length.out = nrow(df), by = "10 min")
df$DateTime <- date #df(df$DateTime, format="%m/%d/%Y %H:%M")
#attr(df$DateTime, "tzone") <- "Africa/Casablanca"

df$year <- year(df$DateTime)
df$month <- month(df$DateTime)
df$week <- week(df$DateTime)
df$day <- day(df$DateTime)
df$hour <- hour(df$DateTime)
df$minute <- minute(df$DateTime)
df$wday <- lubridate::wday(df$DateTime)
```



## Linear regression with ARMA errors (use arima with xreg)

### test: daily data
```{r}
train_er <- df[1:(nrow(df)-6*24),]
test_er <- df[(nrow(df)-6*24+1):nrow(df),]
```

```{r}
time_sta <- Sys.time()
temp_xreg <- as.matrix(train_er[,c("Temperature","hour","minute","wday")])
lm_model <- forecast::auto.arima(train_er$Zone1, xreg=temp_xreg)
lm_model
time_end <- Sys.time()
```
```{r}
temp_xreg <- as.matrix(test_er[,c("Temperature","hour","minute","wday")])
lm_res <- forecast(lm_model,h=nrow(test_er),xreg = temp_xreg)$mean
```

```{r}
pred_lm_monthly <- data.table(time=test_er$DateTime, test_val=test_er$Zone1, pred_val=lm_res)
d <- melt(pred_lm_monthly, id.vars = "time")
p <- ggplot(d, aes(x=time, y=value, color=variable)) + geom_point(size=1) + geom_line()
p + labs(title="Zone 1 Power Consumption: monthly",
        x ="Time", y = "Watt Hours")
```


```{r}
smape(lm_res, test_er$Zone1)
time1 <- time_end-time_sta
time1
```
